title: JvCP测试版（搞笑用）
author: RarityEG
txt_content:
本帖最后由 skjsjhb 于 2020-7-23 16:13 编辑 

PS
有人问我这是啥，我补一句：
这不是Mod！这是Jvav编译器！

RT，首先展示源代码：

pbulci calss HelloJvav{
pbulci sattic viod mian(String[] args){
Sytsem.out.println("Hello Jvav and JCP!");
}
}复制代码编译方法：
F:\JCP\out\artifacts\JCP_jar>java -jar JvBot.jar HelloJvav.jvav
Welcome to JvCP InDev!
Task > Prepare Mapping: Started
Task > Create New Mapping: Started
Task > Version: JvavMapping-20200723-1.0
Task > Initialize Mapping: Started
Task > Initialize Mapping: Done
Task > Create New Mapping: Done
Task > Prepare Mapping: Done
Task > Read Jvav Code: Started
Task > Remap: Started
Task > Remap ipmort to import: Done
Task > Remap jvav. to java.: Done
Task > Remap sattic to static: Done
Task > Remap itn to int: Done
Task > Remap pbulci to public: Done
Task > Remap mian to main: Done
Task > Remap Sytsem to System: Done
Task > Remap calss to class: Done
Task > Remap viod to void: Done
Task > Remap: Done
Task > Rewrite: Started
Task > Rewrite: Done
BUILD SUCCESSFUL
Task > Clean Up And Quit: JvCP will now exit.复制代码然后使用JavaC：
javac HelloJvav.java复制代码接下来就愉快地执行lia~
F:\JCP\out\artifacts\JCP_jar>java HelloJvav
Hello Jvav and JCP!复制代码记住，这个工具叫JvCP和JvBot！
文件我一同上传了，有兴趣的水怪可以试一试
命令格式：
java -jar JvBot.jar <Jvav源代码文件名>复制代码目前仅支持部分jvav特性。
另外，一个纯粹的java程序也是一个jvav程序。
好了，说完了，就当我水贴
@小猫不喝水 








JvBot.jar
